text: Ryan James Thomas (born 10 June 1984) is an English actor, known for portraying the role of Jason Grimshaw in the ITV soap opera Coronation Street, which he played from 2000 until 2016. In 2018, he appeared as Rafael Humphreys in the Australian soap opera Neighbours, and also won the twenty-second and final series of Celebrity Big Brother. ==Early life== Born and raised in Salford, Thomas is of British, Indian and Caribbean heritage. ==Other websites== * Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:English child actors Category:English television actors Category:Actors from Greater Manchester
title: Ryan Thomas
